ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Woot New Weapon!
ygData.messageBody:
/drool

At 10:05 AM 7/5/2001 -0500, you wrote:
>I was camping South Wing in Howling Stones last night and got a Guardians
>Mace - 1HB 14/24 Procs Guard BRD PAL. Kind of strange to have a proc on a
>buff not a click - and would be nice if it affected whole party - not just
>myself - but those are quibbles. The 14/24 ratio is by far better than my
>previous weapons - so I'm thrilled I got it.
>
>We had a Paladin with us - who left less than 15 minutes before the weapon
>dropped. I was the only person not in my friend's (who invited me) guild
>(CLAW) - and that made no difference to their comment "We Always NBG" (so
>much for all the negative comments about people on Xegony...
>
>I previously was using a Blood Runed Short Sword (9/18 Piercing procs 11 hp
>Lifetap) and a Sioniches Partisan in offhand. I'm sticking with the
>Partisan - even though it has a slightly worse ratio (9/19) because of the
>stat bonuses - always nice to have some extra CHA and MR especially when
>mezzing... Too bad the BRSS is no drop...
>
>Slyde Katzenjammer
>Level 55
>Officer, Dragons of Kel'Dar
>
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
>with the subject submissions.
>
>Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
